qas.question: What is the name of Sky Q's broadband router?
What are the Sky Q mini set top boxes able to connect to?

answers.text: Sky Q Silver set top boxes
the Sky Q Silver set top boxes

qas.question: What does connecting different Sky Q boxes enable them to do?

answers.text: to share recordings and other media

qas.question: When is Sky going to introduce UHD broadcasts?
When are the new Sky Q products going to be available?
What is the name of Sky Q's dial-up router?

plausible_answers.text: Sky Q Silver set top boxes

qas.question: What are the Sky Q mini set top boxes never able to connect to?
What does disconnecting different Sky Q boxes enable them to do?

plausible_answers.text: Sky Q Silver set top box

qas.question: What set top box can no longer display UHD broadcasts?

context: On 18 November 2015, Sky announced Sky Q, a range of products and services to be available <a4_1>in <a4_0><a4_2>2016<a4_2/><a4_1/><a4_0/>. The Sky Q range consists of three set top boxes (Sky Q, Sky Q Silver and Sky Q Mini), a broadband router (<a0_0><a0_1><a0_2><b5_0>Sky Q Hub<b5_0/><a0_2/><a0_1/><a0_0/>) and mobile applications. The Sky Q set top boxes introduce a new user interface, Wi-Fi hotspot functionality, Power-line and Bluetooth connectivity and a new touch-sensitive remote control. The Sky Q Mini set top boxes connect to <a1_1>the <a1_0><a1_2><b6_0>Sky Q Silver<a1_2/> set top boxes<b6_0/><a1_1/><a1_0/> with a Wi-Fi or Power-line connection rather than receive their own satellite feeds. This allows all set top boxes in a household <a2_1>to <a2_0><a2_2><b7_0>share recordings<b7_0/><a2_2/><a2_0/> and other media<a2_1/>. The <b8_0>Sky Q Silver set top box<b8_0/> is capable of receiving and displaying UHD broadcasts, which Sky will introduce <a3_1>later in <a3_0><a3_2>2016<a3_2/><a3_1/><a3_0/>.
